about_the_game:
You asked, we delivered, over 10 minutes of the greatest video game music of all time. That’s right, forget whatever game soundtrack you believe is ‘the best’, it sucks in comparison.
The soundtrack of I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MB1ES 1NIT!!!1 will make you cry in its sheer awe. So beautifully composed, it’s like a choir of angels descended from the heavens to perform on the world’s stage, instantly causing the biblical apocalypse right then. This song is so powerful that the only way to break its undying curse of an earworm was to directly contradict its lyrics — no longer is the game made in XNA, nor is it a dollar, and we no longer hope you pay. In fact, the song is also available for the 100% off discount of FREE.

[Lyrics]

Welcome to my game
I put zombies in it for your pain
They come shambling out from the sides
You'd better shoot them or you're gonna die

Cause I made a game with zombies in it
Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah

I made this game using XNA
It costs a dollar and I hope you pay, yeah
Yeah, just a dollar, oh, please pay

Cause I made a game with zombies in it
And I made a game with zombies in it
Yeah, I made a game with zombies in it
Yeah, yeah, oh yeah
Yeah, yeah, oh ho
Oh yeah

Right, right, right, right, right, buh de bah
Right, right, right, right, right, right, row hoo
Right, right, right, right
Right now, right now, right now, right now
Right now, right now, right now
Right, right, right
Right now, right now, right now, right now
Right now

Yeah, yeah
We escaped from space
It was a most unpleasant place
No smile on my face
Even though I'm the ace
Well, yeah, I'm the ace
Ah!

Bombers, bombers everywhere
Make sure you take some care
Always be sure to lock and load
Never know who's going to explode

You never know who's rigged to explode
Never know who's rigged to explode
Watch out lest you explode

Cause I made a game with zombies in it
And I made a game with zombies in it
Yeah, I made a game with zombies in it
Yeah, yeah, oh yeah
Yeah, yeah, oh ho
Oh yeah

name: I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MB1ES 1NIT!!!1 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 18 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 137 MB available space

short_description: The hit single from the hit game, this song also has zombies in it. Available now on vinyl LP, audio cassette, and compact disc![Disclaimer: Not available in any of those formats, nor even the cool vinyl pictured on the store page.]
